extendedInfo.description: Color Your PartyWant to be noticed by everyone in the party? This is the app for you.Set a refresh interval and push the button. It's that simple, and you will be the focal point for everyone.Or you can set it to display just a solid color if that is the theme for the party.You can also tap or slide your finger on the screen to change color.Want to support the developer? Please click on the ads or download the donate version for $0.99, and it's ads free. Thank you!
